title: Beginner Yoga
description: A relaxing yoga session suitable for beginners. Improve flexibility and reduce stress.

title: Advanced Strength
description: High-intensity strength training for advanced athletes. Focus on muscle building and endurance.

title: Cardio Blast
description: A fast-paced cardio workout to get your heart pumping and burn calories.

title: Core Pilates
description: Pilates class focusing on core strength, balance, and flexibility.

title: Spinning
description: High-energy indoor cycling class to improve cardiovascular fitness.

title: HIIT
description: Short bursts of intense exercise followed by rest periods to boost metabolism.

title: Zumba
description: Fun and energetic dance fitness class set to upbeat music.

title: Fitness Boxing
description: Boxing techniques combined with cardio exercises for a full-body workout.

title: CrossFit
description: Intense strength and conditioning program to build power and endurance.

title: Swimming
description: Learn to swim or improve your swimming technique with professional coaches.

title: Meditation
description: Guided meditation sessions to promote mental clarity and relaxation.

title: Kids Fitness
description: Fun fitness activities designed specifically for children to keep them active.
